attributes.action: Stop kicking students out of school for un natural coloured hair.
attributes.background: Most schools are suspending or excluding students for having an unnatural colour in their hair, in my opinion this is wrong as hair doesn't affect learning. Sign this patition to show that you think it is also wrong.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107254
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
